languages.text: "Не галдите так, кто без смены — тому льготный паек. Благодарите Лорд-капитана за милость".
"Pipe down, you lot. Those not on shift will get a free ration. Thank the Lord Captain for this mercy."
languages.original_text: "Не галдите так, кто без смены — тому льготный паек. Благодарите Лорд-капитана за милость".

traits.locale_text: "Don't be so loud. Those not on a shift will get a free ration. Thank the Lord Captain for this mercy."
"Don't be so loud. Those not on a shift will get a free ration. Thank the Lord Captain for this mercy."
"Not so loud. Those not on shift will get a free ration. Thank the Lord Captain for this mercy."
"Not so loud. Those not on shift will get a free ration. Thank the Lord Captain for this mercy."
"Not so loud. Those not on shift will get a free ration. Thank the Lord Captain for this mercy."
"Not so loud. Those not on shift will get a free ration. Thank the Lord Captain for this mercy."
"Pipe down, you lot. Those not on shift will get a free ration. Thank the Lord Captain for this mercy."
"Pipe down, you lot. Those not on shift will get a free ration. Thank the Lord Captain for this mercy."

languages.text: « Un peu de silence, vous autres. Ceux qui ne seront pas choisis recevront une ration gratuite. Remerciez {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} pour sa générosité. »
languages.original_text: "Pipe down, you lot. Those not on shift will get a free ration. Thank the Lord Captain for this mercy."

traits.locale_text: « Pas si fort. Ceux qui ne seront pas choisis recevront une ration gratuite. Remerciez {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} pour sa générosité. »

languages.text: «Cerrad el pico. Los que no están de guardia recibirán una ración. Esta merced es gracias a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "Pipe down, you lot. Those not on shift will get a free ration. Thank the Lord Captain for this mercy."

traits.locale_text: «No tan alto. Los que no están de guardia recibirán una ración. Esta merced es gracias a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán».

languages.text: 「静かにしろ、お前ら。シフトに入っていない者には無料の配給があるんだ。ロード・キャプテンのお慈悲に感謝しよう」
languages.original_text: "Pipe down, you lot. Those not on shift will get a free ration. Thank the Lord Captain for this mercy."

traits.locale_text: 「声を抑えて。シフトに入っていない者は無料の配給がもらえないんだ。ロード・キャプテンのお慈悲に感謝しよう」

languages.text: “都赶紧闭嘴，所有没工作的人也都能拿到一份免费的口粮。快感谢舰长大人的仁慈吧。”
languages.original_text: "Pipe down, you lot. Those not on shift will get a free ration. Thank the Lord Captain for this mercy."

traits.locale_text: “小点声，所有没工作的人也都能拿到一份免费的口粮。感谢舰长大人的仁慈。”

languages.text: "Haltet die Klappe, Leute. Wer keine Schicht hat, bekommt eine Gratisration. Dankt dem Lord Captain für seine Gnade."
languages.original_text: "Pipe down, you lot. Those not on shift will get a free ration. Thank the Lord Captain for this mercy."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht so laut. Wer keine Schicht hat, bekommt eine Gratisration. Dem Lord Captain sei Dank für seine Gnade."

languages.text: "Sessiz olun. Vardiyada olmayanlara birer kumanya dağıtılacak. Merhameti için Lord Kaptan'a şükredin."
languages.original_text: "Pipe down, you lot. Those not on shift will get a free ration. Thank the Lord Captain for this mercy."
